about.title: Who Are We?
about.intro: An international brand based on naturalness, healthy living, and environmental cleanliness.
about.companyText1: Greenleaf (Suzhou Greenleaf Daily Commodity Co. Ltd) is an international brand based on harmony with nature. The headquarters is located in Suzhou, China, in the high-tech national zone.
about.companyText2: Our goal is to deliver healthy, safe, and eco-friendly products to every household. Through over 6000 types of products, we bring the essence of nature and a clean environment to you.
about.companyText3: Each of our products respects nature, cares for human health, and aims for innovation.
about.missionSubtitle: Inspired by nature, caring for life!
about.missionText: We strive to create sustainable products that protect people and the planet, making eco-friendly living accessible worldwide.
